name: VoxelKombat
description:
This is a prototype game built for my dissertation.

The objective is to bump into the other players.

Every 4 players are grouped in a game.

Controls are:

  • WASD+Mouse.
  • L-Click is a projection mechanics which shoots you forward
  • R-Click is a jetpack like jump with depleting fuel

Repos are here:

  • https://github.com/akagetsu/VoxelServ
  • https://github.com/akagetsu/VoxelKombat

Enjoy! :)
